Package Bank

Class CentralBankAppTest

java.lang.Object
Bank.CentralBankAppTest
public class CentralBankAppTest extends Object
Test class for the CentralBankApp application. It contains a series of unit tests designed to validate the behavior of the main functionalities provided by the CentralBank class.

The following operations are tested:

  • Adding a customer
  • Removing a customer
  • Deposit
  • Withdraw
  • Transfer between accounts

  • Constructor Details

    • CentralBankAppTest

      public CentralBankAppTest()

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach public void setUp()
      Set up common test data and configurations. This method is executed before each test. It initializes a CentralBank instance, a Customer instance with a predefined address and date of birth, and other necessary setups for the tests.

    • testAddCustomer

      @Test public void testAddCustomer()
      Test the behavior of adding customers to the CentralBank. Ensures that a customer can be added once and not twice.

    • testRemoveCustomer

      @Test public void testRemoveCustomer()
      Test the behavior of removing customers from the CentralBank. Ensures that a customer can be removed once and not twice.

    • testDeposit

      @Test public void testDeposit()
      Test the deposit operation of the CentralBank. Validates successful deposits and ensures negative deposits are disallowed.

    • testWithdraw

      @Test public void testWithdraw()
      Test the withdraw operation of the CentralBank. Validates that withdrawing an amount greater than the available balance fails.

    • testTransfer

      @Test public void testTransfer()
      Test the transfer operation between two accounts in the CentralBank. Validates successful transfers and ensures transfers of amounts greater than the available balance fail.
